name: TOP
description:
Help Chalky the Chalk Bag reach the top of each route!

Controls:

Use your mouse to direct your arms

Press A to grab with your left hand. Hold to hold, and release to release!

Press F to grab with your right hand. Same deal here :)

Press R to restart a route

Beat the Creators' Times:

Waldo - 15:041

Marathon - 41:916

Super Mario - 09:465

Mango Mansion - 06:830

Tomato Town - 06:944

OJ - 13:464

Arboreal - 16:932

Robin - 05:797

Moonshot - 14:882

Threading the Needle - 19:365

Houston - 15:012

Medium Fries - 24:480
